If you book directly with Sheraton you will be guaranteed and can chose the room you like, along with receiving points for your stay if you enroll for free in our SPG program.  Best regards, The Sheraton team

Summary Heading: Not the greatest, but not the worst.
Summary: Parking fee of $12 is ridiculous. It should be included in the rate. The shuttle to Disney can be avoided by simply taking a UBER ride for a few dollars more.  Overall, the room was clean and comfortable. We didn't try the hotel restaurant, but there are a few choices nearby.  Consider other hotels in the area before making your selection. We usually prefer SPG hotels, because we trust the Starwood standards.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Filthy, smelled bad, poor customer service, HORRIBLE parking that you have to pay for! Keep looking!
Summary: Upon checking into the Sheraton Garden the desk clerk immediately assumed I was a heterosexul and offered to upgrade my "husband" and I to a king bed.  Get with the times people, first of all I am not a heterosexual and do not need an upgrade for my husband and I, but my wife and I would love one!  Just because someone doesn't look a specific way doesn't make them straight.  Upon getting into the room it was horribly dirty.  The carpet was stained, the t.v. had smudges all over it, the lamps were covered in fingerprints, and there was hair in both the shower and the bed that did not belong to either of us.  The hotel had a horrific smell and some suit was walking around with a Bath and Body Works canister spraying the halls and the stinky rooms.  Overall, the room was absolutely
Manager Response: We are sorry that we didn't hit the mark on this trip, and will certainly review your issues with our management team.   We are currently ranked in the top 10% of all Sheraton's in North America for our overall customer service and rated very highly for cleanliness as well.   Best regards, The Sheraton team

Summary Heading: No frills Sheraton with great beds and convenient location!
Summary: I recently used SPG points to stay at this hotel for 7 nights while attending a large sports competition with my daughter and was very pleased with the selection.  We stayed on the 7th floor Club level in a room with two queen beds which were extremely comfortable...high quality bed linens with a duvet, blanket and double sheeted covers...and the room was very quiet with almost no noise from the hallway during the entire week.  Rooms have two comfortable chairs, refrigerators and coffee makers along with an iphone 5/6 charger.  We took advantage of the lounge on the floor for morning coffee and breakfast several mornings...it was never crowded and the selection was good.  They offer coffee, tea, water and soda 24/7 along with an espresso and cappucino maker.  There is a small
Manager Response: none

Summary: We upgraded to the SPG club level on the 7th floor, if you're booked on another floor, this upgrade is great value. For $40/day, you get free wifi, free breakfast and free parking. Parking alone is $8/day, and if you have a lot of people in your party like I did, the breakfast is even better value. The club room on the 7th floor also has snacks from 4pm-7pm, which I didn't get to try, but from what I've heard, is really good as well.  Free breakfast is really good value. Some days they have lox and other days they have bacon/fruit/bagels. You can always get free soda there any time of the day.  The hotel is very clean, the staff is very friendly and the pool is great for families.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Sweet sleeper beds equal a sweet sleep
Summary: I love Sheraton for if nothing else their Sweet Sleeper beds and clean fresh linens! The beds and pillows are like clouds you lay on and never want to leave. The linens don't make your skin crawl and you can actually climb in feeling like no one slept there before you. I love Sheraton signature sweet sleeper beds! The best ever and the number one reason I always look to see if my destination has a sheraton hotel first.
Manager Response: We couldn't have written a better advertisement ourselves! Much thanks for pointing out the comfort of the high end mattress, 300 thread count sheets and all white comforter. Best regards, The Sheraton team

Summary: Great place to stay for Disneyland.  Shuttle comes regularly and drivers are friendly.  Kids enjoyed the pool. Room was clean and staff was nice. Target and 99 cent store across the street.  Small fridge in room.  There are restaurants close by.  Will stay there  again would recommend staying here.
Manager Response: We do love our location with so many restaurants and shopping nearby, and easy access to all the great things Orange County has to offer. Very best, The Sheraton team.

Summary: My husband and I stayed at this hotel for 2 nights for a visit to Disneyland.  The front desk was VERY friendly and helpful.  We had issues with our credit card and they were very understanding and helpful.  We stayed on the club level (floor 7) and had access to the free breakfast and evening social.  Though we did not have time to access the lounge for the afternoon session, we were able to have the breakfast which was very good...in fact one of the best hotel breakfasts I've had.  The eggs were real eggs and very fresh...also had good bacon and breakfast burritos.  There were options for pastries, oatmeal, and cold cereal as well as juices and sodas.  The beds were firm and comfortable.  The pillows were WONDERFUL!!  I slept so great on these beds.  The hotel parking fee was
Manager Response: We appreciate the terrific recommendation and detailed review. We are sure this will help other travelers when deciding where to stay on a Disneyland vacation.  Very best, The team at Garden Grove

Summary: The hotel is clean, nice size rooms and wonderful beds. If you can pay or use your star woods points for the club level. You get free breakfast and access to snacks and coffee 24 hours. They all have a computer for use in the club lounge. This hotel is great for family and business travel. The ART bus does pick up at the hotel bound for the parks. We have always had excellent service at this hotel.
Manager Response: We truly appreciate the high praise and excellent review. Many of our guests do enjoy upgrading to our Club level which has a full hot American breakfast in the mornings, snacks and drinks throughout the day, and evening hors d' oeuvres. Very best, The Sheraton team

Summary Heading: Great Location to be away from Disney chaos and only a short shuttle ride to Disney!
Summary: We always prefer to stay in Garden Grove because you are away from the Disney chaos but only a short shuttle trip to Disney. You have Target across the road for all your basic shopping needs. The shuttle bus is available every 30 minutes so get out there nice and early as they can sneak away a couple of minutes earlier than planned and you can miss it as we experienced the first day there. Rooms were spacious and clean and comfy. Breakfast was good enough for us. Staff were wonderful. Location was great. So close to Red Robbins which is where we dine when we stay there. Great hotel for those want to visit Disneyland!
Manager Response: We sure do appreciate this recommendation and high praise. We are most proud of our customer service, which is currently ranked in the top 5% of all Sheraton's in North America year to date. We do love our location, a quieter area but close enough to the parks and beaches. We look forward to many return trips! The Sheraton Garden Grove team

Summary: We were visiting friends nearby and stayed at the Sheraton for two nights.  The facility is in a great location with numerous restaurants nearby.  It is also a good place to stay for a visit to any of the large attractions in the area (Disneyland, Universal Studios, Knotts Berry Farm, etc.)  The swimming pool is adequate and well maintained.  Rooms are well appointed  and quiet.
Manager Response: This is great to hear. We do love our location, walking distance to many nationally recognized restaurant chains, Target and other shopping areas. We are very quick access also to all the major freeways and a short ride to the beach! Best regards, The Sheraton team

Summary: I really wanted to enjoy my weekend getaway with my family, and I did. I checked in and the woman at the front desk was friendly and efficient. The room was clean and there was plenty of toiletries and soft towels. The next morning i took the kids for a swim and the pool area was nice and clean, although it does need more umbrellas or shade. The issue was the next day after I checked out. I received an email indicating I was being charged for incidentals that I never used. That is the type of thing that makes me never stay at a property again. I want to feel like I can trust them and not have to check every charge and be paranoid that they will try to milk every last dollar. I imagine a lot of people catch it, but a lot probably don't and that is worth the risk for them to do
Manager Response: We're certainly sorry there was a mix-up on the final invoice. We rarely have these types of mistakes, but will certainly review with the management team. Best regards, The Garden Grove team

Summary: I was born & raised on OC. Still have family here. Specifically chose here, when I could have stayed anywhere. I was a guest  here last fall. There are other hotels nearby that have "suites"  (two rooms/or a room with couch/or chair). For Less than what I paid here.  On Sheraton.com the King room was: $172.33 TAX: $24.99 CITY TAX $4.91 PARKING: $12.  Daily:It adds up.  its not inexpensive to stay here.  Although, price aside. this is a very nice, amiable hotel. I checked in way before the stated " check in time" ( A HUGE plus) and was given a courtesy "late check out"  The employees were all very pleasant, helpful, and courteous. Which is a nice change, from all the other (not so happy) hotel employees I encounter monthly.  The only thing that would deter me from staying here
Manager Response: We appreciate the terrific review despite the price. We do guarantee the best price on Sheraton.com and Summer is our very busiest time, July especially.  During most of the rest of the year you'll find many more discounts, packages and pricing in general that is easier on the wallet. Unfortunately, due to the demand in the Summer all hotels in this area have much higher rates.   Best regards, The Sheraton team

Summary: There's a few Starwood hotels in the area, this one costs less than the others so I'll stay here once in a while.  It's close enough to Disneyland, but not right there in the middle of all the chaos.  It's a standard Sheraton, nothing fancy, but nice and clean.  The rooms are good, comfortable, what you would expect.  Parking is cheaper than the hotels closer to Disney, a good option if you want to save a little cash.
Manager Response: We do have an inexpensive shuttle ($3 adults/Kids free) 10 minutes ride to the parks that makes round trips every 30 minutes, and many guests enjoy the location as we are not in the middle of the chaos near the parks and with the higher fees that go with it. Very best, The team at Garden Grove

Summary: This is my 2nd time staying at this hotel.  I first stayed here on business, but this time was for the family vacation. I got a chance to spend a little more time at the hotel with the family during this stay.   Staff The staff was superb!  Sally (I believe that is her name) was great. She and a few others got us all setup into our rooms as well as got us setup with complimentary parking and WiFi. With my large family, this savings on parking helped out quite a bit.   Room The room was nice a big and able to accommodate our large family.  Although we had two rooms, I wish this hotel had suites. Our kids aren't tiny tots anymore--they are teenagers and they take up a lot more room than they used too. One thing I didn't notice or wasn't issue during my first visit was the lack of
Manager Response: We sure do appreciate thorough and extensive reviews- it's makes it much easier for other travelers to make an informed choice in the area.  We are very pleased to receive this feedback and will review it with the entire management team this week. Very best,  The Sheraton team

Summary: Awesome hotel!!! Great service, and the room was very clean. They answered all my questions and had great suggestions about places to visit. My kids liked the hotel arcade, basketball courts and buffet breakfast. The have good shuttle service to the theme parks and the drivers are very helpful.
Manager Response: We love hearing that the staff was accommodating. We spend a great deal of time selecting and training our staff and feel we have the best service in the area. Much thanks for the recommendation and terrific review. Best regards, The Sheraton team

Summary: Great location; kind of the "last" hotel down Harbor Blvd, though they were building something (hotel? offices? ) next door. Staff was very accommodating. The walk to Disneyland was about 35-40 minutes, passing a lot of the other hotels (Wyndham, Marriott,Hyatt, Residence Inn.) Just 1 parking lot away was Joe'es Crab Shack (the bomb!!) and Outback Steakhouse..Bucca de Bepo up the road...very convenient was a Target right across the road for last minute "stuff.) Room was  roomy, beds very comfy...air cond. worked perfect.  I am a real "pool" person and the pool is really small ..(an a little unviting I must say...) no lush landscape  etc and it has one of my travellin pet-peeves: the 500pm sun that should be laying warmth and shadows over the pool is blocked by the high-rise of
Manager Response: This is great to hear!! We love when we see the word fabulous to describe our hotel. We do feel as if we have the best customer service in the area. We are currently ranked in the top 8% of all Sheraton's in North America for our overall service. Best regards, The team at Garden Grove

Summary: We stayed here for a couple nights with my family on the club level.  The hotel was clean and staff were friendly too.  Our room was clean, however, the carpet needs a steam clean.  Otherwise, I felt it was clean.  The breakfast and social hour was great to say the least. I thought the shuttle bus ride there was quick, 10 mins max.  Only problem is getting the shuttle bus ride back.  It's a really long line.  So we ended up taking Uber back home. Great hotel for the price and you're surrounded by great restaurants and a great Italian Ice Cream shop called Joe's Italian Ice.
Manager Response: We appreciate the recommendation and terrific review despite the minor issues. We do feel that we have the best staff in the entire area and are pleased they made this stay enjoyable. Best regards, The Sheraton team

Summary Heading: Nothing good about the hotel to report
Summary: The front desk guy was nice. that'd the only nice thing I remember. The food was OK too.  Room was bad, so was bathtub.  I DONT think I want to stay here again. Definitely not with family.  Parking isnt easy but maybe it was just when I was there that parking was an issue
Manager Response: We're very sorry that the room wasn't up to the expectations here. 95% of our guests give us positive feedback about our rooms so our apologies. Best wishes, The Sheraton team

Summary: The hotel is convenient to Disney, I guess -- I was here on business, but the hotel seemed to be catering to families going to Disney Land.  It's a decent Sheraton with rooms that are nice enough for a pleasant night of sleep.  I have no complaints about the rooms...I don't have a tremendous amount of praise, either.  Nothing special, just your typical Sheraton. It has a decent gym and a restaurant for breakfast.  Staff was cool enough to not charge me for parking since I arrived after midnight and had to leave before 7:00 a.m.  That was a nice gesture.
Manager Response: We're sorry that the stay couldn't have been longer and look forward to being of service again. Best regards, The Sheraton team

Summary: Just ended an 8 night stay at this Sheraton. Very friendly staff and very accommodating. Unfortunately our fridge was not working, but I was awed by the hospitality. I'm definitely coming back here again and recommending this hotel to friends.
Manager Response: This is great to hear! We apologize for the issue with the fridge and will make note of that, however many thanks for the terrific recommendation otherwise. Very best, The Garden Grove team

Summary: When we vacation in Southern California this is the hotel that we usually stay at. It is close to everything in Orange County and is really affordable. I don't know how many times we have stayed here. There aren't a lot of ammenities like a luxurious pool but everything they do have is nice, neat, and comfortable. What's best about this hotel is that it is fairly new and that means it has great insulation in the walls so you never hear the room next door...ever. We have a large family so we usually get two rooms attached and we are very comfortable. Add on top of that the Sheraton mattresses and shower heads and it only makes it better. The work out room is even better than most Sheratons. They took a cue from the Westin's and didn't skimp at all. If you are going to disneyland
Manager Response: Our apologies for the delayed response and thank you for the recommendation and review. We strive to give our guests the best experience possible and due to the upscale décor of the hotel many do think we are a Westin a first glance. We look forward to many returns. Best regards, The team at Garden Grove

Summary: Stayed here over the three nights at Disney. Close to the park, the hotel is good sized and the rooms were clean. There is a Target super center directly across the street and that was convenient. This place was busy but the staff seemed welcoming. The beds were comfortable, but things were well worn in the hotel. My only complaint is that there is one complementary water and one "Non" complementary water - our charge for the water we drank in our room was $12! I could by cases of water across the street at that price, and 10 bucks for WIFI! Come one Sheraton in this day and age- Starbucks gives the stuff away...
Manager Response: We appreciate the recommendation despite the issue with the waters. We do try to keep our pricing similar to other area hotels and have a state of the art complimentary business center for all internet, printing and business needs. Best regards, The Sheraton team

Summary: Having stayed off and on at various Anaheim/Garden Grove/Irvine properties for my business, I wanted to find a place that I could feel like home. I have this feeling when I travel to Las Vegas as I got to know the staff over a frequency of time.   I am a Hyatt & Hilton traveler for most of my life. If I am so blessed to be in a town with a Four Seasons or Ritz, then of course, that is my choice.   What is the best hotel in Anaheim/Garden Grove aside from the Disneyland Hotel or Grand Californian? Cause either their rates are too high or they are sold out. Trying to make a reservations with them is impossible unless 2-3 months out.   I didn't know. I asked my family member who travels to OC a lot and he recommended Sheraton. I laughed! Really...the Sheraton? Back in the day, my
Manager Response: I apologize for the delayed response, however truly appreciate the recommendation and commendation for our Operations people. We feel we've built a great team and are proud of our accomplishment of currently being ranked in the top 8% of all Sheraton's in North America for our overall service. We look forward to many returns.   Best wishes, The team at Garden Grove

Summary: We enjoyed our stay here! The staff was friendly and the rooms were clean. The only thing I thought needed updating was the bathroom. The tub/shower had some mildew/mold on the grout and tub edge. The beds and pillows were very comfortable. That was a huge plus! The PCA bus employees were also very friendly. They always arrived on time or early and were helpful to people who had strollers and kids to get on and off the bus.  We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback and will congratulate the team for their customer service and certainly work with our housekeeping team on the bath issues. Best regards, The team at Garden Grove

Summary: If you're looking to stay at hotel that you will consider as your home away from home, this is definitely NOT the hotel for you. The people at the front desk are not friendly, and no sense of hospitality. The staff made us feel that it is such an inconvenience for them that we are staying at their hotel. However, the housekeeping and maintenance give you the service from a 5-star hotel.  One day, I decided to order from the restaurant, a vegetarian soup and grilled cheese sandwich. The soup was awfully salty. It was so bad I got sick from it. You will be given 1 free bottled water/day, even if you're booked as a couple. They will charge you for extra. Parking is always a problem, and it is not free. As a long staying guest, you would expect some special treatment, but they will
Manager Response: We are certainly sorry we didn't hit the mark this trip. We'll certainly review these comments with the entire team and make changes where necessary. We would like to know more about the food illness from too much salt if you could send a private message to info@sheratongardengrove.com.  We do have rates that include parking and internet, and most hotels in the area do have a parking fee, resort fee or other so best to ask in advance. Best regards, The Sheraton team

Summary: Visited this hotel when I came in town for the Anaheim Ducks Hockey Game. Just a short cab ride to Disneyland and the Pond. Very Friendly Staff. Upgraded me to the Club Lounge for my birthday - complimentary! Clean, New, Modern Gem near home.
Manager Response: This is great to hear! We look forward to being of service again and much thanks for the recommendation!  Best regards,  The team at Garden Grove

Summary: Very uneventful night... the best kind.  Convenient location.  Property is very clean and well maintained.  Quiet rooms and comfortable beds.  Property has a pool, hot tub, club lounge, and laundromat.  Parking was an unexpected additional $12 per night and in similarly located properties is usually free.  Not sure why they felt the need to gouge another $12 out of me.  I did contemplate just parking across the street at the shopping mall since it was free and there was a ton of open parking...
Manager Response: We appreciate the kind words about the hotel. Many of the hotels in the area do have a parking, resort fee or other so best to check in advance. We try to keep any additional fees minimal and at or below the competition.  Best, The Sheraton team

Summary: Great location with helpful and friendly staff - the rooms are a very good size. The pool area was not. Is located in Anaheim South so is about a 10 minute drive to Disney but the hotel offers a free shuttle service.
Manager Response: We appreciate the review and kind words. Very best, The team at Garden Grove

Summary: We stay at this property and we really enjoyed our time there nice rooms nice beds good service good restaurant, the pool area is very small and it can get crowded, not a big deal, they have free shuttle to the parks back and for every half hour price was very reasonable we definitely coming back here
Manager Response: This is great to hear! We do love our location, close to shopping and walking distance to many restaurants, yet far enough away from the congestion of the parks. Best regards, The Sheraton team

Summary: Great staff, clean rooms overall best experience I have had in a long time staying in a hotel. Best hotel in that area!I was greeted every time a staff member saw me! I work at a Starwood hotel and this is the best treatment I ever recieved!! Usually hotels see you work for an hotel and they are very rude so I am very happy with the customer service =)
Manager Response: Appreciate the review- we like to think we treat all of our guests as guests, and hope that you have better experiences at other Starwood and Sheraton hotels, as we always have. Best, The team at Garden Grove

Summary: Love this hotel!They were there at my becking call.such great customer service. I stayed on the club floor.great breakfast,beautiful room.I just can't brag enough.I would definitely stay here again.I work for starwood in Scottsdale,AZ.but I was very pleased with the hospitality & friendlyness this hotel presents.thanks for making our annivery special.loved that it was so close to downtown Disney where we enjoyed dinner and live new Orleans style jazz.sincerely,Shaharra Junious
Manager Response: We are very glad that we were able to make such a memorable impression and Happy Anniversary again! Best, The Sheraton team

Summary: I used my spg points for this stay.  They put us on the 7th floor with club room privileges and free breakfast buffet.  The buffet was way above average with scrambled eggs, sausages, bacon and potatoes.  With a large variety of fruits, pastries, oatmeal, drinks and great coffee. Excellent room with free wifi.  The drinks were somewhat hit and miss depending on who the bartender was.  We had hamburgers at the bar and they were excellent and the fries were as good as it gets.  Overall a great stay.
Manager Response: Appreciate the kind words and recommendation! We do gets lots of comments about our club level as we go above and beyond what the brand requires we serve. Happy to hear the restaurant food was excellent as well! Much thanks, The team at Garden Grove

Summary: If you guys are looking forward to Disney Park, this is a good choice. Room was good for family stays. Breakfast was also good, except if you need convenient store, it is a bit walk from the hotel. Service was more than good with friendly staffs, especially during breakfast time. A number of quick F&B are just walking distance from the lobby.
Manager Response: We do enjoy our location walking distance to Target and many national restaurant chains such as Joe's Crab Shack and Outback Steakhouse. We love hearing about the service that the staff provides above all else however. Much thanks, The Sheraton team

Summary: I'm always afraid to try new hotels but I'm so glad I tried this one! I will totally recommend and be back. Very nice hotel, and very modern. I have a high standard for hotels and this exceeded what I expected. We even ordered room service and the food was super yummy! Thanks for the great service!!
Manager Response: This is great to hear! We're certianly happy to spread the news! Best regards, The team at Garden Grove

Summary: Stayed here two years in a row.  Great place. Negative 12$ day to park a car. Offers $5 gift card to forgo daily room service. Not worth it. Say they want to conserve water yet don't install low flow shower heads.
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback and recommendation! Most of the hotels in the area do charge for parking now, or have a 'resort fee' or other, so best to check before booking. The hotels closer to the parks typically charge more. Best regards, The Sheraton team

Summary: If you are visiting disneyland and don't want to stay in one of the hotels inside, Sheraton is one of the perfect choices. It is not far from disneyland, around 15 minutes by car. We booked a king bed room which was spacious and very clean with nice furniture. Staff were very friendly. Breakfast was nice with reasonable price. The hotel is just opposite to Target, the shopping centre, so if you wanted to buy anything you will need only to cross the road.  Things to improve;  wifi was available for around 11 USD for 24 hours. I think in 2015, this service should be available for free anywhere.  Overall, this hotels reflects the standard to typical 4 star hotel.
Manager Response: Much thanks for this excellent recommendation! The Sheraton team

Summary Heading: Great Hotel & Staff, but beware of parking
Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights. The hotel is really nice, large rooms, clean, very comfortable beds and pillows, good gym. The staff was great and the food on the 7th floor for preferred guests was also good. It is very close to Disney land and has a shuttle if that's what your going for. The convention center is across the street from Disney land "which is why we went", so it's convenient. There are lots of places to eat within walking distance if you want to go out for the night "joes crab shack, red robin". My only complaints are that I wish their hot tub and pool area was larger, and you are forced to pay $12 per day to park your car in their parking lot. I think this should be free for paying guests, but cost for people going there for conferences and such. But over all I
Manager Response: We appreciate the recommendation and look forward to being of service again! Most of the hotels in the area have a parking fee or Resort fee so always good to check ahead on that.  Best regards, The Sheraton team

Summary: The front desk staff were amazing, they were very accommodating. The rooms were very spaces in the bed were comfortable. The shuttle to disney was perfect as well on time everytime. I will definitely stay here next time I'm back at disneyland.
Manager Response: This is terrific to hear! We appreciate the recommendation and kind words- we try very hard to make every guest feel connected. Best wishes, The Sheraton Garden Grove

Summary: This is our second year that we book our rooms at Sheraton Garden Grove Disneyland.  We are much more than pleased.  First, the hotel has always made us feel welcome.  Second, the service, the premium bedding and overall accomodations are above average.  You will see that some reviews will complain about the small parking lot but we have never had a problem due to the free shuttle service.  We park our vehicle the whole time and get shuttled everywhere which is complimentary.  Disneyland is 2 miles away and it takes us no more than ten easy minutes to get right to the gate. It takes you away from the congestion.  Sheraton kudos to you!  Congratulations on running a wonderful establishment that many people can truly enjoy.
Manager Response: Well this is certainly great news! We appreciate the wonderful review and kind words about the staff here. We try very hard to be the most welcoming and friendly team around and are happy that it showed during these stays. Very best, The team at Garden Grove

Summary Heading: Julie at front desk is fantastic
Summary: If you are looking for a hotel with a great staff member who makes you feel welcome and respects your time, then look no further. The hotel was comfortable for my business stay and the staff's service made all the difference.
Manager Response: We'll be sure to recognize Julie and appreciate the time to write this note and recommendation.  Very best, The Sheraton team

Summary Heading: This hotel has it all together!
Summary: Great staff -- customer service oriented firing on all levels! Clean, great value, decent restaurant/food and a shuttle to/from Disneyland. What is there not to like about this value location? I have repeatedly stayed at this hotel due to its staff, awesome service and value. Small gym, but useful equipment.
Manager Response: We appreciate the kind words and recommendation! Last month we were ranked in the top 10% of all Sheraton hotels in North America for our customer satisfaction and we are very proud of the team here for that accomplishment. Best regards, The team at Garden Grove

Summary Heading: Clean, Quiet, Comfortable, Courteous. Can't Say Enough Good Things.
Summary: What a great hotel! We, along with another couple, stayed for 5 days and this was our best experience in Anaheim ever.First of all, the location was about 1.5 miles south of Disneyland so you are just far enough away from all the crowded hotels and traffic noise.Super Target,Roscoe's, Joe's Italian Ice cream are just across the street.The staff was great; you could tell there was good chemistry among all of them and they went out of their way to take care of us.Our room was clean and very quiet at night, didn't hear slamming doors, ice machines etc.We dined at the Hotel restaurant. Fabian and Ana were exceptional waiters and of course the food was great. Obviously,we highly recommend staying at this hotel.
Manager Response: This is great to hear. We'll certainly commend the team, especially Fabian and Ana, who consistently deliver exceptional service. We do love our location as well, close to everything, yet far enough away from the crowds when you want some peace and quiet. Very best, The Sheraton team

Summary: Stayed here for 5 nights in Feb whilst on business.   Booked a club floor room which was a little on the small side. It was a king bed room rather than 2 queens and the room size suffered as a result. I would book 2 queens in future.   Club room was ok. Breakfast was simple but workable. Internet was very good in this hotel compared to others which is a huge plus.   Plenty of parking. Would stay again.
Manager Response: This is terrific news! We appreciate the kind words and recommendation. Very best, The Garden Grove team

Summary: Wow, what a great hotel!  All the 5-star reviews about Sheraton Garden Grove were absolutely on point.  It really is a top-notched hotel!  The lobby is absolutely gorgeous, similar to the high end Westin hotels; the rooms are beautifully decorated and comfortable; its amenities are great; and the service was impeccable.    A lot of chain hotels say that they appreciate your patronage, but it's rare to find a hotel that shows that they mean it, and SGG absolutely does!  From the moment we walked in the door, they made us feel like valued guests, paying special attention to all the details like noticing that it was our son's birthday!  They even sent to our room a wonderful plate of berries and cookies with a lovely note!  It was also impressive that anytime we saw a staff member
Manager Response: Well this is great to hear! We'll certainly commend Minh and the rest of the team for making this stay special. We strive hard to deliver 5-star service and we're happy to be recognized for it. Very much appreciated, The team at Garden Grove

Summary: Flew into LA late and stayed one night at the Sheraton Garden Grove before transferring to Disneyland Hotel the next day.  The SGG was great - big rooms, clean and easy access (even despite the Star Wars Marathon that was on that weekend)   Location is convenient to Disneyland and probably a better hotel than the Disneyland Hotel that cost twice as much.  Highly recommend for families making the Disneyland pilgrimage.
Manager Response: We're thankful for the recognition, and look forward to many returns. Much thanks from the Sheraton team!

Summary: Flew into LA late on a Friday and stayed at hotel for 2 days while we attended the round 2 of supercross at the angel stadium. Hotel was clean, easy to find, close to sites. Good restaurants  near hotel and small fridge in room was nice for small items. The stadium is approximately 3.3 mile from hotel and we walked both ways to hotel. Local area is clean and always felt safe especially walking back at 10pm. Check in staff great and front desk staff were always helpful with any questions we had.
Manager Response: We love our Supercross fans, and are appreciative of the recommendation! Best regards, The team at Garden Grove

Summary: Lucky us, we picked the date when they have the Star War's Disney parade to go to Disneyland. When I called the hotel front desk, it was actually the manager-on-duty answered the phone. She was trying to be helpful, explaining to me the unfortunate situation where the instruction from Disney itself proves to be useless even for staff to come to hotel to work. She told me that she even sent out staff to find the way out to see how to drive to Disneyland, etc...Being a SGP gold member, I am upgraded to the club floor where there is daily hot breakfast and afternoon snack. We stayed for 2 nights and it was quite pleasant except on the first night, around 4am, next door was making A LOT of noise that woke me up. I guess the hotel could use some better insulation?
Manager Response: We appreciate the kind score despite the difficulties. We'll definitely work on better commucication about that once a year Marathon. Thank you for the recommendation! Best regards, The team at Garden Grove

Summary Heading: Good value, great people and we were impressed
Summary: Apparently the few days between Christmas and New Years are the busiest at Disneyland so I was prepared for a very busy property.  We booked two club floor rooms for our family of four and arrived to find exactly what we had ordered.  Rooms were spacious and well appointed.  Bathrooms  had great counters and were large enough for two people to get ready.  It would be great to have a plug near the large mirror in the bedroom area!  Shuttle was a good option but when we were ready to go back to the hotel we took a taxi for $15.  Much faster and we didn't have to wait.  I would stay here again and would recommend it.  It is one of the farthest properties from Disneyland on the strip but it didn't affect the timing of getting there by more than a few minutes.
Manager Response: This is great to hear! We love seeing good value and great people! Appreciate the recomendation and look forward to being of service again. Best regards, The Sheraton team

Summary: We have stayed here twice while visiting Disneyland. The rooms are large and spacious, with modern decor. The hotel has many amenities; pool, hot tub, restaurant, modern fitness centre, and guest laundry (coins required). The staff are pleasant and helpful. The rooms had small fridges which was especially helpful when traveling with children. The shuttle to Disneyland Park was reasonably priced, convenient and reliable.
Manager Response: Modern, reasonable, spacious are all great words to see when reading our reviews, however we're most pleased with seeing pleasant and helpful in describing our staff, who we are very proud of. Best regards, The Sheraton team at Garden Grove

Summary Heading: Decent hotel, about what I'd expect from a Sheraton...
Summary: On the plus side, this is a fairly new property so it rates better than most Sheratons which are generally older. The location is good (only about 2 miles from Disney - not quite walking distance, but there is a shuttle that takes about 15 - 20 minutes, across the street from Target, and near lots of restaurants).  The beds are pretty comfy, there's plenty of parking, and the rates were reasonable.  On the negative side, the club floor was a disappointment. We went to the lounge on two separate occasions and both times, the place was filthy with dirty dishes everywhere.  The food looked old and stale and one on of the trips, they were out of bottled water. The service at the front desk was spotty - some people were great and others acted as if I was bothering them by asking a
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback and will certainly look to make improvements where noted. Best regards, The Sheraton team

Summary: This hotel is a gem.  Our family of 6 stayed here Dec. 27-29 while visiting family and Knott's Berry Farm.  We booked 2 queen rooms and requested that they be connecting and we got exactly that.  Both rooms were clean, quiet and in excellent condition.  All employees we encountered (from the front desk, to the gift shop, to housekeeping) were warm and friendly.    There is a Target across the street and restaurants like Joe's Crab Shack and Outback Steakhouse in walking distance.    No free breakfast and we paid $12/night for parking but the superior service alone that we received at this hotel will definitely bring us back next time we are in town.
Manager Response: This is great to hear! We sure do appreciate the recommendation and look forward to many return trips. Very best regards, The Garden Grove team

Summary: Wasn't sure what to expect when we arrived but we where pleasantly surprised. Our room was very clean and the beds were super comfortable. The staff was very friendly and the shuttle service they have to Disneyland and California Adventure is great!
Manager Response: This is great to hear! We appreciate the kind words and recommendation. Best regards, The Sheraton team

Summary Heading: Excellent layover hotel ... Quiet club floor ....
Summary: We landed late in LA on our way to San Diego and used this as a stop over and all was good in the room. The bed was super comfortable. The room was spacious and modern fixtures and features. The workout room was perfect. The shower was awesome. What more could you want.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel for a quick layover on your trip, we appreciate the nice recommendation and hope you can stay longer and relax with us in the future. Happy Holidays!

Summary: Very nice stay. But Don't choose to not have your bedding changed daily, or they wont even bring new towels or trash bags. Otherwise a great stay! Was there for a week and there  .  Were lots of things to do near by. Disneyland, the beach, shopping. I would recommend this hotel and area of California for a nice family vacation.
Manager Response: We appreciate the kind words and recommendation despite the houskeeping issues, wich we will certainly address.  Best regards, The Sheraton team

Summary: The Disneyland Hotel was booked, so we opted for this hotel.  It is located toward the end of most of the hotels on Harbor Blvd and across the street from a Target, Coco's, a brew pub and a few other restaurants. The Hotel was recently refurbished (very nicely) and our room was fresh and welcoming. The bed was very comfortable and the linens were excellent.  There was only one robe in the closet, but they brought us a 2nd one immediately. The staff is professional and they go about their business very quietly. The shuttle to/from the Disneyland Park was also free and ALWAYS on time.  The shuttle was  clean and well managed, but this wasn't summertime. Our three night stay could have earned 5 stars if the breakfast they served was better.   The eggs were cooked too long, the
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback and review and work hard to make improvements to the breakfast. The recommendations for ease of shopping, walking distance to many national restaurant chains and local favorites as well as the shuttle are welcome. Very best regards, The Sheraton team

Summary: I've stayed at this hotel so many times I can't even count anymore!  A lot of familiar faces everytime i check in and they remember.  My last visit, Francis checked me in.  He is newer but remembered our family.  He was really nice and gave me everything I asked for.  Room near the elevator, one of the bigger rooms... club level etc....  Although all the rooms are a standard room...some are bigger than others.  That is something I found out after staying so many different times.    This hotel used to be only 3k points on weekends and i loved it but it has jumped up to 7k now.  Bummer, but it seems like many SPG hotels are bumping up a category.   The hotel is further than the other SPG hotels near Disney but they offer a shuttle and makes the stay worth it as the others near
Manager Response: Dear Ms. Apncs,  Thank you very much for the 5-star rating. We are thrilled and delighted you have enjoyed your stays with us and continue to come back. Our dedicated staff have all worked hard to get our ratings up and we are truly proud when they are recognized. We look forward to many returns and we appreciate the recommendation!

Summary: Was in GG for the 2014 Elections. I lived here (about 1 mile away) for 22 years. Now, "I'm just visiting". New Hotel, in the midst of 'the tourist zone'.  Very Sherarton-esque. All Beige & Dark Wood decor. Great Service. My Room: Glass Shower doors, Tile. Marble Floors. Very well appointed. Interesting Armoire'. Clean! and well-maintained. No couch, and little to sit on other than the Bed, however...not important. The Pool/jacuzzi (24hours) a HUGE plus, probably great for kids, after a hyper day (& night) at D-Land. A Huge Gym, and healthy food choices. I got the room for $139 on the Starwood website. Didn't not get "the upgrade" to a "club level" . But Saved $40 p/n. If considering a Disney-area hotel; try this one. It's Clean,QUIET, and basically Brand-New. Iam totally
Manager Response: Well welcome back to Garden Grove! We love to hear stories like these a hope to have you again. Best wishes from the entire team

Summary: I have stayed here a total of 7 times for work.  This is a new hotel and you can tell from the rooms.  Each room is larger than most Sheraton's I have stayed.  The showers all have glass sliding doors so there is no issues with a shower curtain. The hotel staff is great and no one has ever given an attitude,   There are plenty of excellent restaurants within walking distance and a free shuttle to Disneyland.  I am  spoiled and constantly compare this to other Sheraton's that do not stand up to this one.
Manager Response: This is terrific to hear! We certainly appreciate the recommendation and look forward to many more visits. Very best regards, The Sheraton team

Summary Heading: Can't go wrong with this Sheraton
Summary: I stayed for business for a 5 days and the hotel was perfect. the service was really good, very helpful, they even helped me weight my bags before going to the airport. The room services was good, the only thing is that one day they forgot to pick up my tag with my menu from the door. The room was very comfortable, very clean. The only turn off point was that they don't have free Wi-Fi in the rooms, they charged per day. There is only complimentary wifi at the lobby area
Manager Response: This is terrific news! We'll be sure to pass along the kudos to the team. Best regards, The team at Garden Grove

Summary: A nice hotel with just a few exceptions.  A major drawback is they charge for Wifi. Pool and jacuzzi were small, no free breakfast, carpet throughout hotel were not properly maintained. Windows in room were really dirty...not a good view.
Manager Response: We are certainly sorry that we weren't the right fit for this trip. As a full service hotel we do have a Restaruant open for breakfast, lunch and dinner and also have room service.  Our rates do fluctuate and may be slightly higher during large conferences at the Anaheim convention center.  Our wireless internet is complimentary in the lobby and we also have a state of the art business center with complimentary internet and printing. We apologize if that wasn't pointed out. Best regards, The Sheraton team

Summary Heading: Nice Rooms & Staff But The Basics Missing
Summary: Recently stayed on a business trip-as such my review might be biased by a business traveller perspective. On the positive side, very very nice rooms-king room had great decor, was a good size and a nice bathroom. Good desk to work on. Staff were very welcoming and friendly. I apologize for forgetting his name, but the club lounge attendant was awesome and hopefully he receives nice tips-great guy. On the negative side-wifi was not working and unless you asked, no one said anything at check in and no sign at the desk (only the LINK area had wifi)-very inconvenient and no concession offered for the inconvenience (it was already not working when we checked in and was the same the next morning which we only found out in the am). Gym is small and very busy-was a bit of a waiting line
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback as we can't improve without it. And much thanks for recognizing the staff and guest room quality.  We are do have a professional company repairing and tuning up all of the fitness equipment, as well as the elevatro, and did have the internet server go out, which was replaced the next day. We apologize we weren't able to troubleshoot it sooner. We recently upgraded to 100Mbps so our internet speeds are generally very fast and now more reliable. We do try to upgrade all of our Platinum guests, however they are based on availability at check-in, so there are times we don't have enough for all and apologize for that. Best regards, The team at Garden Grove

Summary: We stay there from sept 5th to sept 8th, we felt so welcome as soon as we step in, the staff is so nice that you thing is your family, so helpfull with any information we need, we traveled with our 3 kids and asked for conecting rooms, no problem, need restaurants around ? so many choices ! target across the street ! Disneyland just few minutes away, there is a shuttle to disney for only 3 usd but we decide to drive on our own, the sheraton sweet sleeper is my favorite bed in the world, so we slept like babies, our kids loved the hotel, I´m an SPG traveler and this is one of our best experiences if not the best with starwood, we went to san diego, los Angeles and Las vegas on this trip and this was the best place we stayed. There is also a fridge in the room !  Thank you for a
Manager Response: This is terrific to hear! We appreciate the recommendations and kind words, and look forward to being of service again. Best regards, The Team at Garden Grove

Summary: I stayed here recently during a business trip. Overall I liked it. The employees are professional, friendly, outgoing, helpful, and excellent. My issue with this hotel is more at the corporate level. Consider yourself warned that the bottled water they stage in the room is NOT free. I arrived late in the evening from across the country. I was exhausted & had a bad headache. I had carried my own water bottle with me for the whole trip. When I got to my room, the first thing I did was fill it up from the tap. It tasted awful. Then I noticed two bottles of water sitting across the room. I drank both of them and went to bed. When my business trip was over, I came back home and attempted to reconcile my travel. The travel process through my employer is quite complex and involves
Manager Response: We apologiz for the inconvenience. We follow the Sheraton standard that calls for one complimentary water and one charge water per room. We will certainly forward this concern to them. Best regards, The Sheraton team at Garden Grove

Summary: We stayed at the hotel for three nights in August. The hotel, rooms and staff are all grea5, probablybthe nicest place we stayed on our three week road trip. Only gripes were the small swimming pool, the WiFi charges, parking charges and cost of washing powder !  Other than those  its a nice place to stay and I would have awarded it a x5. My tips:  use the free wifi in Reception, buy your washing powder over the road in the Dollar store !
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback and an opportunity to improve! Best regards, The Sheraton team

Summary: Stayed at this Hotel for 1 night, the property is very nice. I was given an SPG floor room and Club access. I was very disappointed with the offerings in the Club lounge, SPG ads currently show fresh food and healthier choices available in the Club lounge. The offerings were Panko Chicken Tenders, French Fries with cheese and bacon, and Hot Chicken Drumetts. No beer or wine was offered and no fresh fruit or salad option. Packaged cookies for dessert. Needless to say I did not partake of the offerings. The staff is so nice at this Hotel it is a shame that Club lounge offerings were not to par.
Manager Response: We'll certainly take a look at the Club offering in the evenings and appreciate the review. Best regards, The Garden Grove team

Summary: This hotel was very friendly, always a hello and welcome back as you walked passed the front counter. Room Service was good as we always arrived late. We where on the Club floor to which  I highly recommend as you get breakfast and snacks at 5:30 - 7 with all the water and pop available. Every day we where given 2 bottles of water for our room fridge. Lots of towels provided. The only thing is they need to add some towel racks as there is enough room in the bathroom for them. I don't like putting my towel on the counter. There is a shuttle bus to the Disney park witch is very handy never had to wait long at all. Parking at the hotel is easy and a little farther down on Harbor so the area isn't as busy.  Free wifi, if you stay on the club floor otherwise you have to pay. We also
Manager Response: We appreciate the kind words and recommendation and look forward to being of service again! Best regards, The Sheraton team

Summary: This hotel is toward the end of many hotels on Harbor Blvd. It is across the street from Target and Coco's Coffee Shop and many eatery. The Hotel room is large, bright and very roomy. It is modern and new. Although there were many prior reviews that said the bed was uncomfortable, I find that I had no problem sleeping and the bed seem perfectly fine with me. The price I paid was reasonable and A $3 shuttle bus to Disney is not too bad. Parking is for a fee.
Manager Response: We do love our location, ans appreciate the recommendation. We are short walking distance to Joe's Crab Shack, Outback Steakhouse and a local favorite, Oggie's! Best regards, The team at Garden Grove

Summary: Due to my poor planning I ended up last minute booking here. The rate was great. We flew in early and called to see if we could check in early. Minh was able to get a room ready for us within an hour of our arrival. Thank you! We were on the club floor which has it's own lounge, snacks and breakfast served daily. The food was good in there but not so much in their restuarant.  The room is large with a fantastic shower! The bed did not seem to be what I am used to with Sheraton but it could have been me. We opted for the Green Choice and while I feel good about saving water I was bummed that when the room is replinished the attention to detail is not there. The coffee pod was not replinished, the shampoo, and toiletries were on one day but not the next. I think four days should
Manager Response: We appreciate the recommendation and will certainly commend Minh and the rest of the team for their excellent customer service! We'll also work on the housekeeping green program. Most of the hotels in this area now charge for parking, so best to call ahead- it's generally more expensive as you get closer to the them Parks, and at the Parks themselves.  Best regards, The Sheraton team

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for 20 days for medical reasons and this hotel was AMAZING to us.  We felt that they took really good care of us, the hotel was very clean as were the rooms.  There were several days that we hung around the room resting and we got a chance to see them regularly cleaning carpets and checking rooms and maintaining the hotel to what we felt was a high standard.  The housekeeping staff were very friendly and efficient.  We had a problem with the remote for our TV and maintenance staff was there in an extremely acceptable time and changed our remote.  We also experienced the restaurant and it was very good.  All of the staff in the hotel were really amazing and friendly.  The only problem I can think of was that people were smoking in the pool area from time
Manager Response: This is terrific to hear! We will certainly share these comments with our entire team. We appreciate the kind words and recommendation. Very best regards, The team at Garden Grove

Summary: First of all, I enjoyed my stay at the hotel. The price of the room was excellent. The location (only 1 1/2 miles from Disneyland) was awesome. The staff greets you every time they see you.The rooms were very room and clean. They seemed to be renovated. The exercise room was very clean with new equipment. The pool was small but kept clean and neat at poolside.  The only setback was the food. The restaurant staff was very friendly but the food was not tasty at all. Luckily they have four good restaurants next door. I had complimentary internet in my room because of my trip, and it was very fast connections.   I definitely recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: We appreciate the excellent recommendation and will work hard to improve the Food experience! Best regards, The Sheraton team

Summary: We stayed her for 2 nights over Labor Day weekend for an Angels game and the Orange street fair. We were with 2 other couples and we all had different size rooms. Ours was the largest and very nice. Super spacious, big bathroom.  If you are coming with kids then I would request a larger room. Service was friendly and superb.  We had the pool all to ourselves on Saturday which was the best part of our stay! Decent size pool with lots of chairs and tables. The gym is next to the pool and looked great too although we didn't use it. The jacuzzi is open late night too.  The best part of the hotel is the price. It was cheaper than the other Starwoods and it's only a little farther. They do have a shuttle for Disneyland.  Only negative thing is that it can get a little loud in the
Manager Response: We appreciate the detailed recommendation and will work to improve where suggested! We love our Angels and Ducks! Very best, The Sheraton team at Garden Grove

Summary: A nice, clean hotel with relatively close proximity to Disneyland.  The staff was nice and friendly.  Rooms were pretty basic, but with a decent size.  Pool was small but adequate.  The value was good at roughly $100 per night.  I would recommend this Sheraton for the price paid.
Manager Response: Many guests do appreciate the 24 hour pool and state-of-the-art Fitness facility, accompanied by our complimentary business center, The LINK at Sheraton.  Best regards, The Sheraton team

Summary Heading: Club floor is the way to go
Summary: I am gladly family and I book the club floor for our two week stay. The club lounge was easily accessible and I loved the fact that you could get drinks, teas etc whenever you wanted.  I was abit diappointed by the room though. From the website, I had thought it was a suite we were getting.  The bell men were amazingly friendly and always willing to help.  Most importantly, I commend the green initiative which they are running. This will go a long way in sustaining the environment.
Manager Response: We appreciate the recommendation and for pointing out the friendliness of the staff here. Many of our guests do enjoy the full hot American breakfast provided in the Club lounge, snacks and drinks all day, and hors d' oeuvres at night. Best regards, The team at Garden Grove

Summary: I stayed here for 12 days while attending a training class being held at the hotel. The hotel staff was helpful and friendly and made sure all your needs were meet during your stay. The restaurant served breakfast, lunch and dinner and was a great value and had an excellent food selection. The bar was near the lobby and was a great place to unwind at the end of the day. They also had a  large pool, hot tub and workout room for your recreational needs. The property also provided a laundry room and game room. They also provided a shuttle bus to Disneyland, free parking and wifi during my stay.
Manager Response: This is terrific news! We appreciate the review and recommendation. We look forward to being of service again soon! Very best, The Sheraton team

Summary: Its a pretty nice place to stay. Clean elegant and good spot for Disney parks. You can pay a shuttle to take you to the parks, if you dont have car.  Downside: Charge for Parking and even worst: for WiFi!   Nice heated oudoor pool.
Manager Response: We appreciate the review and high praise. Most of the full service hotels in the area do charge for parking and internet. It gets more expensive as you get closer to the parks, and since we are further away in a quieter area we do try to keep those fees low.  We do have complimentary WIFI in the lobby and at our complimentary business center. Best regards, The Sheraton team

Summary: I'd like to share a little good and a little bad from my experience. (fyi I'm a Starwood employee and maybe got a total $40 off my stay).   FYI SIGN UP for the SPG(Starwood preferred guest membership) you get two complimentary Dasani bottles of water... me and my boyfriend got to enjoy them instead of paying for Disney's $4/bottle. Also (fun fact) the hotel does provide shuttle service to the happiest place on earth of a small fee of about $2.50 per day. I definitely suggest taking an empty camelback for your waters and some snacks pretzels, goldfish, whole fruits. (Disney's & CA Adv. food is not that great...once they get you in they know you won't leave the park for food.) This hotel seemed very clean and they even provide a little package with a small scrubby wash ball and
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Terrible Stay - Noisy, Outdated & Not Clean
Summary: As a Starwood Gold member, I was pretty disappointed with out stay here. The hotel felt old and outdated - stains on the carpets, garbage and food on the floors in the hallways and a smelly shower curtain that gave the bathroom a terrible stench. Granted it's a busy hotel, but we could hear noisy people in the hallway early in the morning and late at night. Would not stay here again - would sacrifice earning Starwood points for the stay, and just book a room at another hotel chain.
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear about the disappointing visit this trip. From mid-June to mid-August there are many more families at the hotel since we are so close to the Disney parks. The rest of the year we are much quieter with a good balance of business and leisure guests. We are still the newest hotel in the area, however will continue to work hard to keep the current furnishing properly maintained. We appreciate the feedback as always, The Sheraton team

Summary: Was staying in the area for business and chose this hotel because of the rate.  The room was great with a stand up shower, nice big flat screen tv, and plenty of work space.  At Check in I was upgraded to the club level, which was great because I had a big lunch and wanted a small dinner, and breakfast was also included.  The only negative or surprise was the work out room, it was just smaller than I expected for that size of hotel.  It was clean and everything was in working order, just smaller than expected.  Also you have to pay to park, not a surprise and is common for this area, just be aware that there is a fee to park. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: We appreciate the recommendation and review and look forward to many returns. Very best, The team at Garden Grove

Summary: We booked 2 beds for 4 guests.  Upon checkin I was told there was only rooms with King size beds available.  The gentleman at the front desk said he could provide us with a cot.  I simply said no.  After waiting 5 minutes he returned to tell me the manager found us a room with 2 beds.  Then proceeded to tell me that I should never book through 3rd party websites such as expedia hotwire etc. The hotel does not need to sell off their rooms to those companies if they do not wish.  Dont blame the customer upon checkin. The room was fine.  The parking lot was a bit hectic. There was a bus stuck in the middle of the entrance when we left along with the exit gate not functioning properly.  My father inlaw had a lineup of cars honking behind him and nobody answered the intercom for a
Manager Response: We apologize for the inconveniences. We do recommend using the hotels' website if a room preference is required. Some of the 3rd party sites we work with do offer discounted rates, however some of them do allow the choice of bed type, so you receive only what is available at check-in.  We'll certainly take a look at the other issues and review with the management team. Best regards, The Sheraton team

Summary: we always stay at this hotelwhen we are in southern california.  This time we had our grandaughter and we requested a king when we made the reservation but when we arrived we needed two doubles.  The receptionist told us there were no doubles left on the club floor but she would be more than happy to get us a roll a away bed.  When we checked out there wasn't an extra charge.  Wonderful customer service.
Manager Response: This is great news! We appreciate the recommendation and review and will be sure to congratulate the team. Best regards, Garden Grove Sheraton

Summary Heading: Very Uncomfortable Beds ..don't go for the green housekeeping service
Summary: If it were not for the overall look and front desk/ Bell Staff at this hotel I would have probably given it a 2.  The beds are REALLY uncomfortable. The first night we slept ok but we were exhausted but the next two night nobody slept well..Kids usually hit the beds and pass out and they could not even get comfortable.  The rooms are spacious and the furnishings are nice and it was clean when we came in. One of our beds was broken so whomever slept on had their head down lower than the rest of their body.  You cannot use luggage carts on your own, you must use the bell staff so be prepared with tip money!! The front desk asked us if we wanted to use green housekeeping or whatever they call it..meaning we would not have our room cleaned through out our stay. I figured with a room
Manager Response: We appreciate the detailed review and thorough recommendations. There are a variety of international guests that stay at all of the hotels in this area; all of whom are generally very busy and filled with more families in the Summer between June 15- Aug. 15 when children are out of school. The rest of the year we have a good mix of corporate, business travelers and families on vacation, and in general the hotel is much quieter. Ours in particular is regularly rated as quieter than most of the other hotels closer to the Parks.  We'll definitely review these suggestions and make changes where appropriate. Best regards from Garden Grove

Summary Heading: Great location to Disneyland yet peaceful
Summary: I am usually not a Sheraton fan but I stayed here because I have points through the SPG credit card and this location is perfect for our weekend trip to Disneyland. Checked in at 4am, the night clerk was pleasant and efficient checking up is. I found the hotel room is larger than mostly all the hotels I stayed in this area. It is clean and quiet. The gym is sizable and the pool is opened 24 hours. It offers shuttle service to the park. They gave me complimentary bus passes which was surprising to me. Parking is $12 and very basic daily breakfast is $15. Their restaurant serves Starbucks coffee. The hotel is just across the street from Target.   I think this hotel was built before the modern hotel were built. So everything here has classy.  I really enjoy this place.
Manager Response: We are happy to have been a welcome surprise! We are still the newest hotel in the area, and ideally located within walking distance to many fine restaurants and shopping, as well as just a short shuttle ride to the parks!  Very best, The team at Garden Grove

Summary Heading: Great hotel, convenient access to Disneyland
Summary: Stayed here July 16-20.  Arrived late, we were quickly received and given a room with a view toward Disneyland.  Ate dinner in the restaurant once and was impressed with the quick, polite service.  Food was good.  Staff was friendly and they accommodated our late check out request.  Smallish pool and lots of children, but thats what you get by Disney.  Shuttle service to and from DL was quick and friendly.
Manager Response: We are grateful for the recognition and excellent review. We look forward to being of service again soon! The Sheraton team

Summary: The Sheraton Garden Grove was more upscale than many of Sheraton’s properties. Staff at check-in were friendly.My room was clean and modern. When I went for a glass of wine at the bar, no staff was present, and it was at least 10 minutes before anyone appeared. They were other people also waiting in the bar. When I asked if the wine was “oaked” or not, she had no idea what that meant. The glass of Sauvignon Blanc I had was one of the worst I have had in a long time. When I checked in, I told them I had a car parked at the hotel. When I was departing the next day, my ticket did not work in the exit machine to raise the bar, and said I first needed to pay $12. In a hurry to get to my work, I paid with my credit card. Since I had elected to have my folio sent by email, it wasn’t
Manager Response: We appreciate the kind words about the staff and cleanliness of the hotel, and assure you that the parking charge error was not on purpose. Our staff are not incentivized on any revenue basis and in fact are documented for making mistakes such as these, as we have to make adjustments.  As can be seen from hundreds of other reviews, this has not been mentioned before and making sure it never happens again will be a top priority. Our customer service scores rank among the very highest among Sheraton's across North America and we stand behind the team here. Best wishes, The Sheraton team

Summary: We stayed here for 2 days during the 4th of July weekend! It was a really nice hotel, it was busy but granted its down the street from Disneyland but the staff were friendly and helpful. We had to pay for the shuttle from our hotel to Disney-$3 per person, worth it since we didn't want to have to pay for parking for 2 cars and they dropped us off pretty close to the entry way. We had booked via hotwire and so we didn't have a choice in the bedding, we had reserved 4 rooms which all with came with king beds but when we got there we asked for 2 queens for 2 of the rooms and there wasn't any available, they told us to check in the morning but instead we just asked for a roll away that night which was $10 a night but since they didn't have 1 our first night they comp'd it for the
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback and recommendation. We do recommend booking directly with Sheraton as we have many special offers, and the room type can be guaranteed.  In addition, if you sign up for our loyalty program you can earn points for every $.50 spent at the hotels! Best regards, The Sheraton team

Summary: This is my second time staying at this location and chose it because we had such a positive experience and we didn't want to pay extra to stay at the Hyatt where my daughters dance competition was being held. I must say this was a very good choice!  From the moment we walked in to check into our room we were greeted by warm friendly staff who quickly got us checked in and got us a bell hop to gather our stuff and bring it to our room.  Every time we left or returned to the hotel we were greeted by the staff.  They truly enjoy having happy customers.  The daily parking is a decent price compared to my friends who stayed at the Hyatt (where it's $20 a day) the only glitch is the room key doesn't always work with the gate.  No worries the front desk took care of it and told me to
Manager Response: This is terrific news! We appreciate the recommendation as we have tried vey hard to improve our customer service and I'm glad it showed. We are currently among the top tier of all Sheratons in North America for our service scores. We'll work on the parking gate/key issue and thank you for bringing that to our attention. Very best, The Sheraton team

Summary: We stayed here during our trip to Disneyland and everything was great!  Loved the breakfast in the club, the beds were really comfortable and the staff were all really friendly.  The shuttle left for Disney every half hour and was always right on time.  I would highly recommend this hotel for families and it would be great for business, too.
Manager Response: Well this is great to hear! We appreciate the recommendation and hope to be of service in the future! Many of our guests to enjoy the Club level with full hot American buffet, and walking distance to many other great restaurants.  Best regards, The Garden Grove team

Summary: Been staying at both Sheraton  and Crowne Plaza for visiting Disneyland. Room is very similar but Sheraton seems to be better in terms of price. However be aware that Parking is $12 and shuttle $3 and no breakfast compare to the Crowne Plaza.
Manager Response: We appreciate the recommendation. We do try to keep our parking fee less than the other area hotels. Always check before staying at any hotel in the area. Some have 'resort fees' to cover parking or internet, some parking fee, and others limited service with no fees. Best regards, The Sheraton team

Summary: I was told when I checked in that evening reception end at 8:30PM for gold and Platinum members.  I went there around 7:45 to find out that the server was cleaning up and the food are in the kitchen.  She was kind enough to let me get some of them.  Around 8:10PM, someone came in and look for food.  He was also told by the front desk during check-in that it ends at 8:30.   The front desk staffs need to to be retrained and informed of the time of the evening reception.  Other than that, everything was fine. Room was clean WiFi was OK Parking was $19.  I did not check if I could find parking on the street Lounge was fine.  Food was ok in the evening.  Breakfast was acceptable.
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback and recommendations and very much look forward to making changes where we can. Many of our guests do love the full hot American breakfast served in the Club Lounge that others don't offer. Best regards, The Sheraton team

Summary Heading: The Best Hotel Ive ever cone across!
Summary: Firstly the location of the hotel is great extreaamly close to Disney with shuttles going from there every morning for just $3 pp. Secondly the staff are exceptional!! Never to much hassle to do anything for you, always willing to help and always giving such a warm greeting. Mike - (One of the Bell Boys) is an asset to the hotel aswel as franklin! Both of them made our stay even better so thank you!
Manager Response: Well this is terrific to hear! We are so grateful for the recognition and excellent recommendation. We have worked very hard this year to improve our customer service and we're glad to see it paying off. We 'll certainly commend Mike and Franklin! Best regards, The team at Garden Grove

Summary: My husband and I have stayed here several times in the last couple of years. We tried somewhere closer to the park, the marriott anaheim , and hated it and had to leave. We were taking cabs to the park from the marriott anyway, and marriotts rooms were small, old, and the staff was awful! I don't know how they can have the marriott stamp, but anyway we ran over to the Sheraton and they took such good care of us from beginning to end. We now appreciate them more then ever. Attentive friendly staff really does make all the difference in a stay. I also noticed since our stay a few months ago they have been doing some better upkeep on the property and the club level lounge food experience has been completely overhauled....so so so much better then the previous experience. We go so
Manager Response: We appreciate the high praise and thorough review! And we look forward to being of service in the future! Best regards, The team at Garden Grove

Summary: Spent a few nights here in April. The location is good, close to Disney and all of the attractions, but was very upset by the cleanliness of the pool. I understand, Santa Ana winds swept through the area and leaves were inevitably going to get in the pool, but they made very little attempt to clean it throughout the day. Also, I think parking is overpriced as this hotel is by a target and restaurants (not walking distance to disney).  Club lounge attendant was very nice, and the rooms were typical of a Sheraton (no balconies though). Hotel rooms were clean, and lobby was nice.    Used to be a category 2, now a 3, so I would no longer consider it a good value for points, however I heard you can get good deals here.
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback and look forward to making improvements where we can. We do try to keep our parking fee at or below the market rate, and have a shuttle to Disneyland. Best regards, The Sheraton team

Summary: The staff is  cheerful and helpful there just is not enough of them for the volume the hotel does.  The lobby is very small & the line can get very long.  Everything about this hotel is "small".  They took a Sherton built it as large as usual  and them shrunk the size of the lobby, restaurants, resort areas, pool, gym, etc.  The pool is tiny and un-shaded.  Don't expect lovely grounds- it a tiny concrete pond that is so crowded you will not even think about it unless you have kids that pull you kicking & screaming.  The rooms are shrunk also.  They are much smaller in size & the bathroom is tiny with no vanity space.  Not a good lay out for families, for anyone really.   The club lounge was always dirty, full of trash on the tables and unkept.  It was never re-stocked with
Manager Response: We've made some big improvements since February based on feedback we've received and our current customer satisfaction are now some of the best in the nation. We'll keep working to improve!  Best regards, The Sheraton team

Summary: Stayed here 7 times over the last 9 months as part of a course I was taking. The staff was very helpful in terms of both the conference rooms and hotel rooms. Fairly new facility with a decent workout room and small pool. It's only about a mile and a half down the street from Disneyland Resort and they have a shuttle that will take you there for a few $$$. Food in the restaurant is typical hotel food.  Again, the staff is the star of the hotel.
Manager Response: We appreciate the recommendation and will certainly congratulate the Staff, who have improved their customer service considerably this year, to one of the top rated Sheraton hotels in the country. Best regards, The Sheraton team

Summary Heading: The only place I stay at now.
Summary: This has to be the most friendly and cleanest hotel I have every stayed at.   They had a deal where we paid for 3 night and got the 4th night free, so it made it worthwhile to stay at a upgraded hotel.  The room was very nice and comfortable and clean. The staff were friendly and helpful  We got a full breakfast each morning with the price...  They even parked my car and had a shuttle to Disneyland included.  Just Awesome.  A plus in my book.
Manager Response: We certainly appreciate the high praise and look forward to many returns! We appreciate the commendation of the staff and will definitely congratulate them. Best regards, The Team at Garden Grove

Summary: Stayed here for 3 days while at a convention in Anaheim. Short walk to the center.  Cleanest and nicest hotel I have stayed at in the area.  Thoroughly enjoyed our few days there!  Can't wait to come back.
Manager Response: We can't wait to be of service again! Best regards, The Sheraton team

Summary: A great hotel after a bad experience with the airline losing my luggage! I have stayed at all of the Sheraton hotels in Anaheim, and figured I would give the garden grove a shot. I had an excellent stay at this hotel, they have good service and good breakfast! The view from our room was the only part of the stay that was subpar. The view consisted of looking at old apartments and homes, but I wasn't staying for the view, I was there to go to Disneyland!  My favorite of the three Sheraton Hotels in this area would be the Sheraton Park Hotel At The Anaheim Resort, with the Sheraton Garden Grove (this hotel) at number two and the Sheraton Anaheim Hotel at number three. Safe travels everyone!
